data.persona: I am a holy person. With authority from god.
data.description:
You are in the main prayer room.
This is a room that is large, a prominent place of the temple. Everywhere there are stone benches, and there is colored stained glass on the high walls, a large stone altar is at the head of the room, the walls are adorned with gold and silver ornaments, and the floor is rich with
The nun is here.

You are carrying a Wine and a Cross, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I have to give wine to the nun so she can drink it.
data.mid_motivation: I have to perform church rites this morning.
data.long_motivation: I have to be on top of my game because the church is looking for new bishops.
